description:
Olimpe Technology is an innovative company founded in 2015 that specializes in a breakthrough water purification technology based on electrolysis. This technology generates hypochlorous acid from mineral salts in water, providing a natural disinfectant solution that is effective for various applications, particularly in the agri-food and livestock sectors. The initiative aims to reduce reliance on chemical disinfectants, which have significant environmental impacts and health risks.

Initially focused on the swimming pool market, Olimpe Technology has shifted its focus to the agri-food industry, local authorities, and public establishments, addressing recurring water quality issues. The company has developed nearly 300 installations in the livestock sector and is now working to expand its presence in the agri-food market, where it aims to provide safe, chemical-free water for food production and processing.
name: Olimpe Technology
